en.use_ii: Use Internet Identity to manage your accounts on the IC without being tracked.
en.your_ii_is: Your Identity Anchor is a number that connects you to your accounts on applications across the Internet Computer. Store your Anchor somewhere safe. If you lose it, you lose access to all of the accounts that you created with it. Internet Identity keeps your anchor private and does not share it with any applications.
